entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
